channel.title: 317 Bigger hits on different client [pi]
channel.description:
So, I'm running a PI 317 on this client, and on one client, the hits are normal, like 0-99, and on the other it is 0-999
What can I change on the client so that the hits are 0-999?
What I mean by this is if I hit a 20 on an opponent, it'd show a 20. I want it to show a 200, like it does on this other client, but can't figure out why.
let me know! I'm sure it's an easy fix.
EDIT: I figured it out. I changed the boolean of newDamage to true. my b boys

item.title: 317 Bigger hits on different client [pi]
item.dc:creator: @deathe1000 deathe1000
item.description:
@deathe1000 wrote:

So, I’m running a PI 317 on this client, and on one client, the hits are normal, like 0-99, and on the other it is 0-999

What can I change on the client so that the hits are 0-999?

What I mean by this is if I hit a 20 on an opponent, it’d show a 20. I want it to show a 200, like it does on this other client, but can’t figure out why.

let me know! I’m sure it’s an easy fix.

EDIT: I figured it out. I changed the boolean of newDamage to true. my b boys
